customer_addr:
5001 S W Rucks Dairy Rd
Okeechobee, FL 34974
narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
The applicant wishes to be licensed by USDA with a new Class C - Exhibitor's license.  The applicant will submit all
license applicable fees to the USDA-APHIS-AC Director of Operations in Fort Collins, Colorado for processing.  The
mailing address where the applicant needs to submit the license fees is as follows:
     United States Department of Agriculture
     Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service
     Animal Care
     Fort Collins Office
     2150 Centre Avenue
     Building B, 3W11
     Fort Collins, CO 80526
No USDA regulated activities are permitted at the premises until the USDA license is issued, and received by the
applicant.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
